messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: New Sword Show

messages.messageBody:
Hi Rich, thanks for the update. You guys are fast on the East Coast!
I've heard twice that there is no Texas show this year. Mike Q supposedly
said maybe in'06.
Take care, George

messages.messageBody:
--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, Jurgisg2@a... wrote:
> Hi Rich, yes of course. I'll do it on Tuesday. I need to have the
address
> of the hotel as well. It will be great if you would list it for all
to see.
> Thanks, George

George -

No need to send it. Jim G. sent me the info. It's
already posted :-) Thanks anyway.


BTW, does anyone know if there is a San Antonio show
this year? It is also usually held in May.

Rich S

Hi Rich, yes of course. I'll do it on Tuesday. I need to have the address

Thanks, George

messages.subject: Re: New Sword Show
messages.msgSnippet: George - Yahoo removes attachments for those of us reading it online. Could you post the details of the show; Title, dates, place, contact persons and email.
messages.messageBody:
George -

Yahoo removes attachments for those of us reading it
online. Could you post the details of the show;
Title, dates, place, contact persons and email.
I'd like to add it to the calender on my website.

Thanks
Rich

messages.subject: Re: New Sword Show
messages.msgSnippet: Hi to all.  I would like to announce a new Japanese sword show that is going to be held in May in Chicago this year.  It is going to be called the Midwest
messages.messageBody:
Hi to all. I would like to announce a new Japanese sword show that is going
to be held in May in Chicago this year. It is going to be called the Midwest
Token Kai and will be hosted by Marc Porpora. This show will replace the old
Chicago show that was held in the fall. I am attaching a flier so please read
the specifics from that.
The show dates are May 20.21, &22. There will be a lecture and display by
Bob Benson of
Important Juyo, along with other activities. So please plan to attend.
Thanks, George


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
